verses.roman:
mālākāra kahe,--śuna, vṛkṣa-parivāra
mūlaśākhā-upaśākhā yateka prakāra

synonyms: mālā-kāra—the gardener; kahe—said; śuna—hear; vṛkṣa-parivāra—the family of this transcendental tree of devotional service; mūla-śākhā—chief branches; upaśākhā—subbranches; yateka—as many; prakāra—varieties.
translation: Lord Caitanya thus addressed the multifarious varieties of branches and subbranches of the tree of devotional service:
